question: What does the following CAML query do?
quoted_text:
<Field Type="Text" Name="FavColor">
<Description>Enter your favorite color here. If you dont have a favorite color, enter "Black".
</Description>
<Default>Black</Default>
</Field>
answer_new_1: Provides descriptive text and sets the default value of the FavColor field to black.
answer_new_3: Will remove the default value of "Black."
answer_new_4: Checks if the default value is black.
resource_title: Default Element
